title: Your Source for Scoops Half a Day Before They’re Announced Publicly
author: John Gruber
excerpt: Something went wrong, but don’t fret — let’s give it another shot.
text: Something went wrong, but don’t fret — let’s give it another shot. Some privacy related extensions may cause issues on x.com. Please disable them and try again.
html:
Something went wrong, but don’t fret — let’s give it another shot.

Some privacy related extensions may cause issues on x.com. Please disable them and try again.
